## MultidimensionalPlot.setBackground() method

Set the background color of the 3D canvas

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  color | RGBColor \| string | The background color |
